name: You're Too Fast!
description:
Mechanics:

Crashing into walls damages your ship

Going backwards restores health, but the ship is harder to control

Braking reloads ammo, but also charges a speed boost. Releasing early cancels ship momentum

Shooting bullets locks the ship's velocity, but it can now shoot in a direction different from its forward velocity

No audio ;)

Controls:

Automatic acceleration

A/D or move mouse to turn

Left click to shoot

Right click to brake

S to reverse
